message: Do you still remember those old jokes we used to laugh at? I hope those kind of memories can boost your mood when you're having a rough day.
I really like being around you. I hope your days will always be filled with blessings and you always find ways to be grateful.
As Dr. Lauren Fogel Mersy said: 'Deep breathing is our nervous system’s love language.'
I'm sorry if I have ever left bruises on your body, or wounds in your heart, or even scars on your mind.
There is a saying that 'Vulnerability sounds like truth and feels like courage. Truth and courage aren’t always comfortable, but they're never weakness.'
Somewhere, somehow, someone feels happy just knowing you're alive.
note: Be and keep the genuine people around~
